<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 神奇的人鱼 于 2025-8-21 14:59 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu34.gif" smilieid="998" border="0" alt="">碎碎念一波，这可能是wps的bug或者有意为之<br>
<br>
给出自定义文件关联的路径，：<strong>jpg&gt; "&lt;安装wps的路径&gt;\Kingsoft\WPS Office\12.1.0.22529\office6\photolaunch.exe" /photo /view "&lt;curitem&gt;" </strong><br>
1. 找到wps图片的exe所在位置<br>
<img id="aimg_xwN5N" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/pVcp8Lj5/1.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/pVcp8Lj5/1.png"><br>
2. XYplorer在工具，自定义文件关联中新建一个<br>
<img id="aimg_oCz4K" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/PrLNMnb3/2.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/PrLNMnb3/2.png"><br>
3. 保存后在XYplorer中打开jpg格式的图片就可以通过wps图片打开了<br>
<img id="aimg_Q8R99" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/6QK3w7kg/3.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/6QK3w7kg/3.gif"><br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
